ygData.subject: Re: Re: Lambent OPINIONS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Awww... you shouldn t have =P ... I ve got a lot of lambent quest items, which need to be fused and the product needs to be handed over to a deserving
ygData.messageBody:
> And here's one friend that's grateful for your opinions, Song Brother! I've
> engraved your name on my axe. =D

Awww... you shouldn't have =P

> I twink any younger bard I see who has a polite aire about him/her and a
> genuine love for the singing profession.
> As for Lambent, I'll get it when the time is right, but have no plans to
> even go for a bracer for a few levels. Bronze been berry berry good to me.

I've got a lot of lambent quest items, which need to be fused
and the product needs to be handed over to a deserving bard.

Perhaps, we could work out a subquest for you. Maybe run
some errands for me, pickup a few items I've been looking
for. I believe I have spare BP components laying around.
Footing a 250pp bill for jewels is asking a lot from a L20
person, so I can cover the cost in return for your services.

Harmonic.
